dcterms:creator: Z. Gao
dcterms:description: A dataset related to the Active Disturbance Rejection Control (ADRC) methodology, which facilitates stability analysis and reduces the number of tuning parameters.
dcterms:title: Active Disturbance Rejection Control (ADRC)

dcterms:creator: Z. Gao
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a method for tuning controllers based on scaling and bandwidth parameterization.
dcterms:title: Bandwidth Parameterization

dcterms:creator: M. Buhl
B. Lohmann
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses the design of controllers using exponentially decaying Lyapunov functions, particularly for systems with input saturation.
dcterms:title: α-controller design

dcterms:creator: H. Sira-Ramírez
A. Luviano-Juárez
M. Ramírez-Neria
E.W. Zurita-Bustamante
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on the Active Disturbance Rejection Control of dynamic systems using a flatness-based approach.
dcterms:title: Extended State Observer (ESO)

dcterms:creator: Z. Gao
Y. Huang
J. Han
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents an alternative paradigm for control system design, emphasizing the integration of various control strategies.
dcterms:title: Control System Design
